experience.company: "DONGFENG MOTOR RUS" LLC., official distributor & importer DFM brand vehicles in RUSSIA, Moscow

industries.name: Cars, Trucks, Motor Transport, Buses, Trolleybuses (Manufacturing)

experience.description:
1. Development of the DFM brand dealer network in Russia
2. Searching for new candidates for DFM brand dealers.
3. Coordination of development and sales plans, design projects of show-rooms for new dealers.
5. Preparation and signing of dealer contracts.
6. Launch of dealerships (certification and category award).
7. Control over the implementation of DFM car sales plans for dealers in the entrusted region.
8. Securing the plan of shipment of cars by the distributor to dealerships.
9. Development of joint partnership programs with financial institutions (banks, leasing companies, insurance agencies)
10. Coordination of marketing and advertising companies in the regions of presence.
11. Acting marketing and brand manager - producing of regular marketing reports and analysis on competitors, market share, economical situtation etc. for local distributor and head office in China. Approval and validation with distributor and head office in china of new models to be launched on the Russian market.

Achievements:

1. Development and launch of the financial program DFM Direct in cooperation with UniCredit Bank.
2. Launch of more than 10 new dealerships in Russia. Full cycle: from the search for candidates to the start of car sales by the dealership.
